sprint_goal: Establish foundational infrastructure, CI/CD, and observability for the Vendor & Catalog service to enable parallel feature development.
key_deliverables: Runnable NestJS service; Automated CI/CD pipeline; Configured logging, metrics, and tracing.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate a successful deployment to staging via a merge to main; Show correlated logs in CloudWatch; Show API metrics in Grafana.
success_criteria: All infrastructure is managed as code; CI/CD pipeline is fully automated and includes quality gates; Service is observable.
risk_factors: Skill gaps in Terraform/EKS (RISK-004); Complexity of secure CI/CD integration with AWS.
mitigation_strategies: Schedule pair programming sessions on Terraform; Use official AWS/GitHub Action templates for OIDC authentication.
external_dependencies: AWS EKS cluster and VPC must be available.
burndown_target: Complete foundational tasks by day 7 to allow for integration and pipeline testing.

sprint_goal: Implement core vendor profile and catalog management, enabling vendors to set up their store, define business hours, and manually add their first products.
epic_coverage: Vendor Profile & Compliance Management, Product Catalog Management
key_deliverables: Functional vendor profile management UI and API; Ability for vendors to set business hours and availability; Full CRUD for product categories; Ability for vendors to add new products with images.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate a vendor logging in, updating their store address, setting business hours, creating a category, and adding a new product.
success_criteria: All acceptance criteria for core vendor stories met; A vendor can fully configure a basic store.
risk_factors: External dependency on Mapbox API (RISK-006); Complexity of secure file uploads to S3.
mitigation_strategies: Implement circuit breaker for Mapbox API; Conduct security review of the S3 pre-signed URL implementation.
integration_windows: Frontend/Backend integration for profile and product forms by day 5.
burndown_target: Complete backend APIs by day 6 to provide stable endpoints for frontend integration.

sprint_goal: Complete the product management lifecycle (Edit/Delete) and establish the vendor compliance foundation with license management and automated suspension.
epic_coverage: Product Catalog Management, Vendor Profile & Compliance Management
key_deliverables: Full CRUD for products (Edit/Delete); UI and API for vendor license management; Automated job to suspend vendors with expired licenses.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate editing an existing product; Deleting a product (and showing it's blocked if in an active order); A vendor adding their license details; Show a vendor being automatically suspended after their license expires.
success_criteria: Product CRUD is fully functional and secure; Compliance features are automated and auditable.
risk_factors: Tight coupling risk for product deletion cross-service check (RISK-001); Logic for scheduled job must be robust.
mitigation_strategies: Refactor product deletion to be asynchronous in a future sprint, for now use a circuit breaker; Add comprehensive logging and alerting for the compliance job.
external_dependencies: API contract with Order Management service for active order check.
integration_windows: Integration with Order Management service API for active order check by day 4.
burndown_target: Complete product lifecycle features by mid-sprint to focus on compliance automation.

sprint_goal: Launch the bulk product import feature, including asynchronous CSV processing, detailed error reporting, and automate the license expiry reminder system to ensure vendor compliance.
epic_coverage: Bulk Data Operations & Onboarding, Vendor Profile & Compliance Management
key_deliverables: End-to-end bulk CSV product import functionality; Downloadable error reports for failed imports; Automated email/push notifications for expiring vendor licenses.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate uploading a valid CSV and seeing products appear; Upload an invalid CSV and download the specific error report; Show a notification being triggered for a license expiring in 30 days.
success_criteria: Vendors can self-serve bulk product uploads; Compliance reminders are fully automated.
risk_factors: Data corruption risk in async import (RISK-002); Observability challenges for background jobs (RISK-003).
mitigation_strategies: Implement Transactional Outbox pattern for the worker; Mandate OpenTelemetry and correlation ID propagation for the entire async flow.
integration_windows: Testing of the full asynchronous import pipeline by day 8.
burndown_target: Complete the core CSV processing worker by day 7 to allow for thorough testing and error handling refinement.

sprint_goal: Deliver tools for the internal onboarding team to streamline data migration and validation, and provide vendors with a catalog export capability.
key_deliverables: A standalone script for the onboarding team to transform vendor data; An admin UI for validating migrated data; A feature for vendors to export their full catalog.
demo_objectives: Run the transformation script on a sample vendor file; Use the admin UI to approve a migrated data batch; Demonstrate a vendor exporting their catalog to a CSV file.
success_criteria: Internal team's onboarding workflow is streamlined; Vendors have full data portability.
risk_factors: Performance of catalog export on primary DB (RISK-005).
mitigation_strategies: Mandate that the export worker reads from a database read-replica and uses streaming to process results.
burndown_target: Complete backend workers for export and internal tools by day 6 to allow for UI integration.
